case.title: Simply - a Lovely girl needed - 44 (London Central)
case.text:
Hi I am looking for a lovely girl for a romance.
I am mid 40-ties, white, tall, handsome, dark blonde hair, professional, have love & positiveness inside me and a taste for good things (food + wine + drink) I can accommodate in area of Oval \ Kennington. Hope to meet you soon a lovely girl for dating.
This is a genuine advert, please reply with a photo, next would be to meet up for a drink as I am not into emails etc ... One last thing I do not mind if you are in relationship, I will keep it discreet anyway.
Thanks for reading p.s no escorts, no agencies or alike
